oNama.oNama-Info1: has existed since 1993 and our core business is distributing hardware for construction joinery and furniture fittings.
oNama.oNama-Info2: Dabel is a team of ambitious, capable, young people ready for improvement and further progress in providing the best services.
oNama.oNama-KljucniJedan: The year we built a business facility of 5,000 m² housing our production, customs warehouse, technical service, dispatch and sales departments, as well as all the necessary conditions for quality work for a company that desires to maintain its leadership position in the Serbian market.
oNama.oNama-KljucniDva: We expanded and opened a branch in Montenegro.
oNama.oNama-KljucniTri: We continued expansion, opening branches in Kosovo, Bosnia, Macedonia and Albania.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiJedan: Customer care, fair relations with partners, and concern for the work environment are priorities for us. We strive to keep long‑term quality, as well as introduce innovations to make ordering and delivering goods easier.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiDva: We introduce B2B ordering where our partners can order goods at any time.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiTri_Jedan: we introduced ordering of goods via
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiTri_Dva: which is continuously improved and gives partners all the information about products.
oNama.oNama-NaseVrednostiPet: Our mission is to act responsibly, focusing on the care of customers, as well as improving the quality of our products.

usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedan: Allows you to use the services and content of its website according to the terms of use listed below. These terms apply to all the content and services of the site.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Dva: It is considered that users are aware of these terms if they use any part of the site, and accept that the content of this site is used exclusively for personal use and at their own risk.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Tri: Has copyright on all contents (text, visual and audio materials, databases and program code). Unauthorized use of any part of the site without the owner's permission is considered a copyright violation and can lead to legal consequences.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Cetiri: About important changes and additions to the terms, Dabel d.o.o. may notify users via email or by publishing on the site.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Pet: By using the site you are considered familiar with the latest rules on terms of use and privacy policy.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Sest: Dabel d.o.o. strives to provide accurate product information, including images, descriptions and technical details, but does not guarantee complete accuracy due to possible technical errors. Product colors on screen may differ from real ones.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Sedam: Data you provide on the site are used for internal purposes and will be protected in accordance with the Law on Personal Data Protection. We use your data only for request processing, informing about offers and communication with our team.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Osam: Data will not be published or shared with third parties without your consent.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Devet: The site may contain links to other locations for better user experience. Dabel d.o.o. is not responsible for content on external locations.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-ZaposljavanjeNaslov: Employment and processing of candidate data
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Deset: When selecting and hiring, the candidate agrees that Dabel d.o.o uses their data exclusively for selection purposes. Data is stored on internal servers and not shared with third parties.
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedanest_Jedan: Candidates may withdraw consent at any time by contacting via email address,
usloviKoriscenja.usloviKoriscenja-Jedanest_Dva: after which their data will be deleted from the database.

posao.posao-PosaoTitl: WE ARE LOOKING FOR WORKERS TO PACKAGE PRODUCTS
posao.posao-Jedan: If you are interested in becoming part of our team, you may send your work resume, which we will review and contact you in case there is a need for new employees.
posao.posao-Dva: Send applications with your resume to the address:
posao.posao-Tri: We thank all interested candidates in advance.
